metadata.description: How likely this connection is to last and deepen over time
metadata.sentence_template: For the long haul, this looks ___.

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Saturn aspects show staying power and commitment. Juno shows partnership style. North Node shows destiny alignment.

planet_meanings.Saturn: staying power, commitment, and building together
planet_meanings.Juno: partnership needs and what you seek in a mate

very_low.label: Short-Chapter
very_low.guidance: Likely meaningful phase, not forever; can still matter without lasting.

low.label: Fragile
low.guidance: Could last but only with major work; name risk clearly.

mid.label: Unwritten
mid.guidance: Future very open; depends on choices both make.

high.label: Steady Path
high.guidance: Good foundations for going the distance if nurtured.

very_high.label: Endgame
very_high.guidance: Strong long-term signature; genuine lasting potential.
